entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 33 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then clearing. Blowing snow at times this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 33 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Near blizzard. High minus 25.
